original_title: Sri Lanka coconut auction prices end 6-pct down in 2023
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s coconut auction prices ended down 6.6 percent at 75,879 rupees per thousand nuts at the last auction of the year on December 21, official data showed.
At an auction on December 22, last year, the average auction price was 81,304 rupees, according to Coconut Development Authority auction data.
The highest auction average was 85,014 rupees reached on February 23, 2023.
Auction prices surged 11 percent from 67,966 rupees at the December 14 auction.
At the last auction of the year 478,896 nuts were offered at 341,240 nuts were sold.  (Colombo/Jan01/2024)
